59f3b0158bf5501e050f358d.name: Curse of the Sad Mummy
59f3b0158bf5501e050f358d.description: Amumu entangles surrounding enemy units in bandages, damaging them and rendering them unable to attack or move.
59f3b0158bf5501e050f358d.tooltip: Amumu entangles surrounding enemy units, dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage and preventing attacks and movement for 2 seconds.

59f3b0158bf5501e050f3589.name: Daisy!
59f3b0158bf5501e050f3589.description: Ivern summons his Sentinel friend Daisy to fight with him. Daisy will send out a shockwave if she attacks the same champion three times in a row.
59f3b0158bf5501e050f3589.tooltip:
Ivern summons his sentinel friend Daisy. If Daisy attacks the same champion three times in a row, she will create a shockwave knocking enemies up for 1 second (3s cooldown). Daisy gains additional damage and defenses based on Ivern's Ability Power.

Recasting this ability will direct Daisy to a new target or position.

59f3b0138bf5501e050f3565.name: Riftwalk
59f3b0138bf5501e050f3565.description: Kassadin teleports to a nearby location dealing damage to nearby enemy units. Multiple Riftwalks in a short period of time cost additional Mana but also deal additional damage.
59f3b0138bf5501e050f3565.tooltip:
Kassadin teleports to a nearby location dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ f2 }}) (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage to surrounding enemy units.

Each subsequent Riftwalk within the next {{ e2 }} seconds doubles the Mana cost and deals an additional {{ e3 }} (+{{ f1 }}) (+{{ f3 }}) magic damage per stack, stacking up to {{ e6 }} times.

59f3b0138bf5501e050f3573.name: Noxian Diplomacy
59f3b0138bf5501e050f3573.description: Talon stabs the target unit. If they are within melee range, this attack deals critical damage. If they are outside melee range, Talon will leap at his target before stabbing them. Talon refunds some health and cooldown if this ability kills the target.
59f3b0138bf5501e050f3573.tooltip:
Talon leaps to target and deals {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) physical damage. If cast from melee range, Talon does not leap but instead critically strikes, dealing {{ f2 }}% damage ({{ f3 }}).

When Noxian Diplomacy kills a unit, Talon regains {{ f4 }} health and refunds {{ e5 }}% of its cooldown.

59f3b0158bf5501e050f358e.name: Siphoning Strike
59f3b0158bf5501e050f358e.description: Nasus strikes his foe, dealing damage and increasing the power of his future Siphoning Strikes if he slays his target.
59f3b0158bf5501e050f358e.tooltip:
Nasus's next basic attack will deal {{ e1 }} (+{{ a2 }}) (+{{ f1 }}) physical damage.

Siphoning Strike permanently gains {{ e2 }} damage if it kills an enemy. This bonus is doubled against Champions, large minions and large monsters.

59f3b0138bf5501e050f355c.name: Flamespitter
59f3b0138bf5501e050f355c.description: Rumble torches opponents in front of him, dealing magic damage in a cone for 3 seconds. While in Danger Zone this damage is increased.
59f3b0138bf5501e050f355c.tooltip:
Rumble torches his opponents, dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage in a cone over 3 seconds.

Danger Zone Bonus: Deals {{ e5 }}% damage.

59f3b0148bf5501e050f357e.name: Ebb and Flow
59f3b0148bf5501e050f357e.description: Unleashes a stream of water that bounces back and forth between allied and enemy champions, healing allies and damaging enemies.
59f3b0148bf5501e050f357e.tooltip:
Unleashes a stream of water that bounces back and forth between allied and enemy champions.

On Ally Hit: Heals {{ e3 }} (+{{ a2 }}) Health and will bounce to a nearby enemy champion.

On Enemy Hit: Deals {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage and bounces to a nearby allied champion.

Bounces to each target only once, and hits up to {{ e2 }} targets. The damage and healing value is modified by ({{ f1 }}%) each bounce.

59f3b0138bf5501e050f3570.name: Aegis of Zeonia
59f3b0138bf5501e050f3570.description: Pantheon leaps at an enemy and bashes them with his shield, stunning them. After finishing the attack, Pantheon readies himself to block the next attack.
59f3b0138bf5501e050f3570.tooltip: Pantheon leaps at target enemy, dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage and stunning them for {{ e2 }} second. Pantheon also instantly refreshes his Aegis Protection.

59f3b0138bf5501e050f3572.name: Grand Skyfall
59f3b0138bf5501e050f3572.description: Pantheon composes himself then leaps into the air to a target, striking all enemy units in an area. Enemies closer to the impact point take more damage.
59f3b0138bf5501e050f3572.tooltip:
Pantheon gathers his strength and then leaps high into the air, crashing down at target area a few seconds later. Deals up to {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage to enemies at the center (down to {{ e3 }}% at the edge) and slows their Movement Speed by {{ e4 }}% for 1 second.

If Pantheon cancels this channel, Grand Skyfall is put on a {{ e5 }} second cooldown.

59f3b0158bf5501e050f358b.name: Despair
59f3b0158bf5501e050f358b.description: Overcome by anguish, nearby enemies lose a percentage of their maximum Health each second.
59f3b0158bf5501e050f358b.tooltip: Toggle: Nearby enemies take {{ e2 }} magic damage plus {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }})% of their maximum Health each second.

59f3b0158bf5501e050f358a.name: Bandage Toss
59f3b0158bf5501e050f358a.description: Amumu tosses a sticky bandage at a target, stunning and damaging the target while he pulls himself to them.
59f3b0158bf5501e050f358a.tooltip: Throws a bandage to target location. If it hits an enemy unit, Amumu will pull himself to the enemy, stun them for 1 second, and deal {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage.

59f3b0158bf5501e050f3586.name: Shunpo
59f3b0158bf5501e050f3586.description: Katarina blinks to the target, striking it if its an enemy, or striking the nearest enemy otherwise.
59f3b0158bf5501e050f3586.tooltip:
Katarina dashes in the blink of an eye to the target ally, enemy, or Dagger. If it is an enemy, Katarina strikes for {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) (+{{ a2 }}) magic damage - otherwise she strikes the nearest enemy in range.

Picking up a Dagger will reduce Shunpo's cooldown by {{ f1 }} seconds ({{ f3*100 }}%).

16

59f3b0168bf5501e050f3597.name: Golden Aegis
59f3b0168bf5501e050f3597.description: Jarvan IV calls upon the ancient kings of Demacia to shield him from harm and slow surrounding enemies.
59f3b0168bf5501e050f3597.tooltip: Grants a shield that absorbs {{ e1 }} (+{{ e3 }} damage for each nearby enemy champion) damage for {{ e4 }} seconds, and slows surrounding enemies by {{ e2 }}% for {{ e5 }} seconds.

59f3b0168bf5501e050f3591.name: Tactical Sweep
59f3b0168bf5501e050f3591.description: Camille blasts in a cone after a delay, dealing damage. Enemies in the outer half are slowed and take extra damage, while also healing Camille.
59f3b0168bf5501e050f3591.tooltip:
Camille winds up and then slices in a direction, dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ f1 }}) physical damage to enemies hit.

Enemies hit by the outer half are slowed by {{ e4 }}%, decaying over {{ e2 }} seconds. They take extra physical damage equal to {{ e5 }}% (+{{ f2 }}%) of their maximum health, healing Camille for {{ e9 }}% of the bonus damage dealt (healing capped at {{ f3 }} from non-champions).

16

59f3b0158bf5501e050f3587.name: Consume
59f3b0158bf5501e050f3587.description: Nunu commands the yeti to take a bite out of a target minion or monster, dealing heavy damage to it and healing himself.
59f3b0158bf5501e050f3587.tooltip:
Nunu commands the yeti to take a bite out of a minion or monster, dealing {{ e1 }} true damage and healing himself for {{ e2 }} (+{{ a1 }}).

Passive - Feed The Yeti: For every Large or Epic Monster Consumed, Nunu gains increased Size, {{ e0 }}% Maximum Health, and {{ e9 }} out of combat Movement Speed for the next {{ f5 }} seconds (max {{ e6 }} stacks).

Recently Consumed monsters will not grant additional bonuses ({{ e5 }} second cooldown).

59f3b0168bf5501e050f3592.name: The Hextech Ultimatum
59f3b0168bf5501e050f3592.description: Camille dashes to target champion, anchoring them to the area. She also deals bonus magic damage to the target with her basic attacks.
59f3b0168bf5501e050f3592.tooltip:
Camille briefly becomes untargetable and leaps onto an enemy champion, interrupting channels and locking them into an area they cannot escape by any means for {{ e3 }} seconds. Other nearby enemies are knocked away. Her basic attacks against the trapped enemy deal bonus magic damage equal to {{ e2 }} plus {{ e1 }}% of their current health.

16

59f3b0138bf5501e050f3571.name: Heartseeker Strike
59f3b0138bf5501e050f3571.description: Pantheon focuses and unleashes 3 swift strikes to the area in front of him dealing damage to all enemies. Pantheon also becomes more aware of his enemy's vital spots, allowing him to always crit enemies below 15% Health.
59f3b0138bf5501e050f3571.tooltip:
Passive: Pantheon's basic attacks and Spear Shot gain 100% critical strike chance against targets below {{ e3 }}% Health.

Active: Pantheon focuses and delivers {{ e4 }} swift strikes in front of him for a total of {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) physical damage (deals {{ e2 }}% damage to minions and monsters).

Damage per Strike: {{ f1 }}

59f3b0248bf5501e050f35b8.name: Winds of War
59f3b0248bf5501e050f35b8.description: Galio fires two windblasts that converge into a large tornado.
59f3b0248bf5501e050f35b8.tooltip:
Galio fires two windblasts that deal {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage.

When the windblasts meet, they combine into a giant tornado that deals {{ e5 }} (+{{ charabilitypower2*3 }}) plus {{ e2 }}% of enemies' maximum Health (max {{ e4 }} vs. monsters) as magic damage over {{ e3 }} seconds.

59f3b0138bf5501e050f355f.name: The Equalizer
59f3b0138bf5501e050f355f.description: Rumble fires off a group of rockets, creating a wall of flames that damages and slows enemies.
59f3b0138bf5501e050f355f.tooltip:
Rumble launches a line of rockets that creates a burning trail for 5 seconds. Enemies in the area have their Movement Speed slowed by {{ e3 }}% and take {{ e1 }} (+{{ a2 }}) magic damage each second.

You can control the placement of this attack by clicking and dragging your mouse in a line.

59f3b0158bf5501e050f358f.name: Wither
59f3b0158bf5501e050f358f.description: Nasus ages an enemy champion, decelerating their Movement and Attack Speeds over time.
59f3b0158bf5501e050f358f.tooltip: Nasus ages target champion over {{ e3 }} seconds, slowing their Movement Speed by {{ e2 }}%, increasing to {{ e1 }}% over the duration. The target's Attack Speed is reduced by half the amount.

59f3b0138bf5501e050f3567.name: Deceive
59f3b0138bf5501e050f3567.description: Shaco becomes Invisible and teleports to target location. His next attack deals bonus damage.
59f3b0138bf5501e050f3567.tooltip:
Shaco teleports nearby and becomes Invisible for {{ e3 }} seconds. Shaco remains Invisible even if he uses Jack in the Box or Hallucinate.

His next basic attack during or shortly after Invisibility will deal {{ e1 }} (+{{ f1 }}) (+{{ a1 }}) physical damage ({{ f2 }} with Backstab) and reduce Deceive's cooldown by {{ f3 }} seconds.

16

59f3b0148bf5501e050f357f.name: Tidal Wave
59f3b0148bf5501e050f357f.description: Summons a massive Tidal Wave that knocks up, slows, and damages enemies. Allies hit gain double the effect of Surging Tides.
59f3b0148bf5501e050f357f.tooltip:
Summons a Tidal Wave from Nami's position. The wave knocks up enemies and slows them by {{ e4 }}%, dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage. The duration of the slow increases based on how far the Tidal Wave has traveled, with a minimum duration of 2 seconds and a maximum of {{ e5 }} seconds.

Allies hit by the wave gain double the effect of Surging Tides.

59f3b0168bf5501e050f3590.name: Final Spark
59f3b0168bf5501e050f3590.description: After gathering energy, Lux fires a beam of light that deals damage to all targets in the area. In addition, triggers Lux's passive ability and refreshes the Illumination debuff duration.
59f3b0168bf5501e050f3590.tooltip: Fires a dazzling ray of light dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage to all enemies in a line. Final Spark ignites and refreshes the Illumination debuff.

59f3b0148bf5501e050f3577.name: Trample
59f3b0148bf5501e050f3577.description: Alistar tramples nearby enemy units, ignoring unit colision and gaining stacks if he damages an enemy champion. At full stacks Alistar's next basic attack against an enemy champion deals additional magic damage and stuns them.
59f3b0148bf5501e050f3577.tooltip:
Alistar tramples the ground, ignoring unit collision and dealing {{ f1 }} (+{{ f2 }}) magic damage over {{ e3 }} seconds to nearby enemies. Each pulse that damages at least one enemy champion grants Alistar a Trample stack.

At {{ e5 }} Trample stacks Alistar empowers his next basic attack against an enemy champion to deal an additional {{ f3 }} magic damage and stun for {{ e6 }} second.

59f3b0138bf5501e050f3569.name: Flame Chompers!
59f3b0138bf5501e050f3569.description: Jinx throws out a line of snare grenades that explode after 5 seconds, lighting enemies on fire. Flame Chompers will bite enemy champions who walk over them, rooting them in place.
59f3b0138bf5501e050f3569.tooltip: Jinx tosses out 3 chompers that, once armed, explode on contact with enemy champions, rooting the target for 1.5 seconds and dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) Magic Damage over 1.5 seconds to nearby enemies. Chompers last for 5 seconds.

59f3b0148bf5501e050f3578.name: Thunder Claws
59f3b0148bf5501e050f3578.description: Volibear erupts with chain lightning, damaging a number nearby enemies. The power of the storm causes Volibear's attacks to blast his targets with lightning that bounces to other nearby enemies.
59f3b0148bf5501e050f3578.tooltip:
Volibear erupts with chain lightning, striking up to 4 nearby enemies with {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage.

For the next {{ e3 }} seconds, the storm empowers Volibear, causing his basic attacks to deal {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) bonus magic damage that chains to {{ e4 }} nearby enemies.

59f3b0138bf5501e050f355d.name: Scrap Shield
59f3b0138bf5501e050f355d.description: Rumble pulls up a shield, protecting him from damage and granting him a quick burst of speed. While in Danger Zone, the shield strength and speed bonus is increased.
59f3b0138bf5501e050f355d.tooltip:
Rumble tosses up a shield for 2 seconds that absorbs {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) damage. Rumble also gains an additional {{ e2 }}% Movement Speed for 1 second.

Danger Zone Bonus: 50% increase in shield health and Movement Speed.

59f3b0138bf5501e050f3564.name: Force Pulse
59f3b0138bf5501e050f3564.description: Kassadin draws energy from spells cast in his vicinity. Upon charging up, Kassadin can use Force Pulse to damage and slow enemies in a cone in front of him.
59f3b0138bf5501e050f3564.tooltip:
Kassadin draws energy from spells cast in his vicinity, gaining a charge whenever a spell is cast near him.

Upon reaching 6 charges, Kassadin can use Force Pulse to deal {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage and slow enemies by {{ e2 }}% for {{ e3 }} second in a cone in front of him.

59f3b0138bf5501e050f356f.name: Spear Shot
59f3b0138bf5501e050f356f.description: Pantheon hurls his spear at an opponent, dealing damage.
59f3b0138bf5501e050f356f.tooltip: Pantheon hurls his spear at an opponent, dealing {{ e2 }} (+{{ f1 }}) physical damage.

59f3b0158bf5501e050f3588.name: Savagery
59f3b0158bf5501e050f3588.description:
Rengar slashes all enemies in an arc before piercing all enemies in a line. Casting this outside the max range moves Rengar a short distance in that direction.

Ferocity effect: deals increased damage.
59f3b0158bf5501e050f3588.tooltip:
Slash all enemies in an arc before piercing all enemies in a line for {{ e1 }} (+{{ f2 }}) physical damage per strike.

Ferocity effect:
Each hit deals {{ f1 }} (+{{ a2 }}) damage.

If cast outside max range, Rengar lunges forward to extend the range of the piercing attack.
If used during leap, Savagery is cast immediately following the leap.

59f3b0138bf5501e050f355e.name: Electro Harpoon
59f3b0138bf5501e050f355e.description: Rumble launches a taser, electrocuting his target with magic damage and slowing their Movement Speed. Rumble can carry 2 harpoons at a time. While in Danger Zone the damage and slow percentage is increased.
59f3b0138bf5501e050f355e.tooltip:
Rumble shoots his opponent with up to 2 tasers, dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage and applying a stacking slow of {{ e2 }}% for 2 seconds.

Danger Zone Bonus: Damage and slow percentage increased by 50%.

59f3b0158bf5501e050f3584.name: Quickdraw
59f3b0158bf5501e050f3584.description: Graves dashes forward gaining an Armor and Magic Resist boost for several seconds. If Graves dashes towards an enemy champion, gain two stacks of True Grit instead. Hitting enemies with basic attacks lowers the cooldown of this skill and refreshes the resistance boost.
59f3b0158bf5501e050f3584.tooltip:
Dashes in a direction, reloading one shell. Graves gains True Grit for 4 seconds. If Graves dashes towards an enemy champion, gain two stacks of True Grit instead.

Basic attack hits lower the cooldown of Quickdraw by {{ e4 }} seconds. Damage against non-minions also refreshes True Grit.

True Grit grants {{ e5 }} Armor and Magic Resist (stacks up to {{ e0 }} times).

59f3b0158bf5501e050f358c.name: Tantrum
59f3b0158bf5501e050f358c.description: Permanently reduces the physical damage Amumu would take. Amumu can unleash his rage, dealing damage to surrounding enemies. Each time Amumu is hit, the cooldown on Tantrum is reduced by 0.5 seconds.
59f3b0158bf5501e050f358c.tooltip:
Passive: Amumu takes {{ e1 }} reduced damage from physical attacks.

Active: Amumu deals {{ e2 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage to surrounding units. Each time Amumu is hit, the cooldown on Tantrum is reduced by 0.5 seconds.

59f3b0368bf5501e050f3804.name: Triumphant Roar
59f3b0368bf5501e050f3804.description: Alistar charges his roar by stunning or displacing enemy champions or when nearby enemies die. When fully charged he heals himself and the nearest ally champion.

59f3b0368bf5501e050f3806.name: Cursed Touch
59f3b0368bf5501e050f3806.description: Amumu's attacks reduce the target's Magic Resistance for a short duration.

59f3b0368bf5501e050f3805.name: Visionary
59f3b0368bf5501e050f3805.description: Nunu can cast a spell for free after 5 attacks.
